name: Fullalead
text: Activate:Main You may trash 1 card from your hand and rest this Stage: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Blackbeard Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand and rest this Stage: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Blackbeard Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a 'SAMPLE' and has a watermark, but the printed ID, set, number, and rarity are legible.
